content:
ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty Class

Definition

The ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty class represents a schema property definition that is contained in the schema partition.

In this Article

public class ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty : IDisposable
Inheritance
System.Object
ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Constructors

ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty(DirectoryContext,String)

Initializes a new instance of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty class.

public ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that specifies the context for this ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

ldapDisplayName
String

A String that represents the LDAP display name for this ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

context does not refer to a valid Forest or ConfigurationSet, or ldapDisplayName is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

context or ldapDisplayName is null.

Remarks

The Save method must be called to commit the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object that was created to the Active Directory Domain Services.

Properties

CommonName

Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

public string CommonName { get; set; }
Value
String

A String that gets or sets the CN of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Description

Gets or sets a description of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

public string Description { get; set; }
Value
String

A String that gets or sets a description of the current ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsDefunct

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object is defunct.

public bool IsDefunct { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the current schema property object is defunct. true if the object is defunct; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsInAnr

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is in the ANR set.

public bool IsInAnr { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the schema property is in the ANR set. true if it is in the ANR set; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsIndexed

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is indexed in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

public bool IsIndexed { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the current schema property is indexed in the Active Directory Domain Services store. true if the property is indexed; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsIndexedOverContainer

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is indexed in all containers.

public bool IsIndexedOverContainer { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the schema property is indexed in all containers.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsInGlobalCatalog

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is contained in the global catalog.

public bool IsInGlobalCatalog { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the schema property is contained in the global catalog. true if it is contained in the global catalog; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsOnTombstonedObject

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is in the tombstone object that contains deleted properties.

public bool IsOnTombstonedObject { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the schema property is contained in the tombstone object. true if it is contained in the tombstone object; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsSingleValued

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is single-valued.

public bool IsSingleValued { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the schema property is single valued. true if it is single-valued; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

IsTupleIndexed

Gets or sets a value indicating whether there is a tuple index for this schema property.

public bool IsTupleIndexed { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the schema property has a tuple index. true if there is a tuple index for the property; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Link

Gets an ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty that links to the current schema property.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty Link { get; }
Value
ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty

An ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object that is linked to the current ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

LinkId

Gets or sets the value for the link identifier when the schema property is linked.

public Nullable<int> LinkId { get; set; }
Value
Nullable<Int32>

An Int32 value that represents the linkID value when the schema property is linked. For more information, see the topic Link-ID in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

Name

Gets the ldapDisplayName of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object. For more information, see the topic LDAP-Display-Name in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

public string Name { get; }
Value
String

A String value that contains the ldapDisplayName of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object. For more information, see the topic LDAP-Display-Name in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Oid

Gets or sets the OID of the schema property.

public string Oid { get; set; }
Value
String

A String value that contains the OID of the current ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

RangeLower

Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum value or length that the schema property can have.

public Nullable<int> RangeLower { get; set; }
Value
Nullable<Int32>

An Int32 that represents the minimum value or length of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object value.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

There is no lower range for this property.

RangeUpper

Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum value or length that the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object can have.

public Nullable<int> RangeUpper { get; set; }
Value
Nullable<Int32>

An Int32 value that indicates the maximum value or length of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object value.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

There is no upper range for this property.

SchemaGuid

Gets or sets the schemaIDGuid for the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object. For more information, see the topic Schema-ID-GUID in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

public Guid SchemaGuid { get; set; }
Value
Guid

A Guid that represents the schemaIDGuid for the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object. For more information, see the topic Schema-ID-GUID in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Remarks

The SchemaGuid is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.

Syntax

Gets or sets an ActiveDirectorySyntax object indicating the property type (syntax) of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax Syntax { get; set; }
Value
ActiveDirectorySyntax

An ActiveDirectorySyntax object that defines the property type of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

The specified type is not a valid ActiveDirectorySyntax value (applies to set only).

Methods

Dispose()

Releases the resources that are used by the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

public void Dispose ();

Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

true if the managed resources should be released; false if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

FindByName(DirectoryContext,String)

Gets an ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty FindByName (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that specifies the context for the search.

ldapDisplayName
String

A String that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema property to search for.

Returns
ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty

An ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object for the schema property that is found. null if the property is not found.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

The object was not found.

ArgumentException

context does not refer to a valid Forest or ConfigurationSet, or ldapDisplayName parameter is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

context or ldapDisplayName is null.

GetDirectoryEntry()

Gets the DirectoryEntry object for the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

public System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry ();
Returns
DirectoryEntry

A DirectoryEntry object that represents the directory entry for the schema property.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object is not a valid instance.

Save()

Commits all changes to the current ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object to the underlying directory store.

public void Save ();
Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectExistsException

An ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object of the same name already exists.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ToString()

Gets the LDAP display name of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.

public override string ToString ();
Returns
String

A String that represents the LDAP display name of the ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty object.
